text: Hanki Hesbonima me'nea hozaramimo'a hagege nehigeno, Sibmanema me'nea waini hozamo'a ana zanke huno hagege hu'ne. Hagi mago'a kumapi kini vahe'mo'za ana waini hozafina e'za knare'ma hu'nea waini raga'aramina eme regatati hu'naze. Ana waini hozamofo agema'ama ometre emetrema hu'neana, Hesbonine Sibma rankumateti agafa huteno vuno, noti kaziga Jazeri ran kumate vuteno, zage hanati kazigama me'nea hagege kokantega vuteno, vuvava huno zage fre kaziga Fri'nea hagerinte uhanati'ne.
